text: Rudolphus Antonius "Roy" Makaay (born 9 March 1975) is a Dutch professional football coach and former footballer. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Europe Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Vitesse 1993–94 Eredivisie 10 1 10 1 1994–95 Eredivisie 34 11 34 11 1995–96 Eredivisie 31 11 – 31 11 1996–97 Eredivisie 34 19 5 3 – 39 22 Total 109 42 114 45 Tenerife 1997–98 La Liga 36 7 0 0 – 36 7 1998–99 La Liga 36 14 2 0 – 38 14 Total 72 21 0 0 74 21 Deportivo La Coruña 1999–2000 La Liga 36 22 2 1 3 3 41 26 2000–01 La Liga 29 16 0 0 6 1 35 17 2001–02 La Liga 30 12 2 1 9 1 41 14 2002–03 La Liga 38 29 5 1 11 9 54 39 Total 133 79 9 3 29 14 171 96 Bayern Munich 2003–04 Bundesliga 32 23 4 2 8 6 44 31 2004–05 Bundesliga 33 22 5 5 8 7 46 34 2005–06 Bundesliga 31 17 5 0 8 2 44 19 2006–07 Bundesliga 33 16 3 0 8 2 44 18 Total 129 78 17 7 32 17 178 102 Feyenoord 2007–08 Eredivisie 28 13 5 7 – 33 20 2008–09 Eredivisie 31 16 3 4 6 0 39 20 2009–10 Eredivisie 24 7 4 3 0 0 28 10 Total 83 36 8 14 6 0 101 50 Career total 526 256 42 26 67 31 636 314 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Netherlands 1996 1 0 1997 1 0 1998 0 0 1999 0 0 2000 7 0 2001 6 0 2002 5 2 2003 6 1 2004 15 3 2005 2 0 Total 43 6 :Scores and results list the Netherlands goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Makaay goal.
